ArgonTest.Name: Tuple argument
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
proc printTuple(a: String, b: String): () do puts a puts b end
proc printTuple2(tupleValue: (String, String)): () = printTuple tupleValue
proc main(): () do val tupleValue: (String, String) = "1", "2" printTuple2 tupleValue end
